thread.title: Facebook shares tumble as FTC announces probe

title: Facebook shares tumble as FTC announces probe
text:
Facebook shares tumble as FTC announces probe   01:41 
Shares of Facebook fell more than 5 percent Monday after the Federal Trade Commission said it's investigating the social network over data privacy. Fred Katayama reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Shares of Facebook fell more than 5 percent Monday after the Federal Trade Commission said it's investigating the social network over data privacy. Fred Katayama reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Gq6mpN
